nodes.text: Jordi Dauder (March 5, 1938 - September 16, 2011) was a Spanish actor who dubbed the voice of Palpatine in the Spanish-language versions of the Star Wars prequel trilogy. Born in Barcelona, Dauder worked in film, theater and television, as well as voice acting, and in 2009 won the Goya Award and Spanish Actors Union award for best supporting actor his role in the film Camino (2008). He lived in Madrid at the time of his death from cancer.
